body_html: FYI, I worked with @alrojo last Friday & was able to run his rnn code on real translation data (which produces similar results as the dynamic_rnn). I have also proposed several simplifications to the code. So, looking forward to a new and cleaner version from @alrojo soon!

body: FYI, I worked with @alrojo last Friday & was able to run his rnn code on real translation data (which produces similar results as the dynamic_rnn). I have also proposed several simplifications to the code. So, looking forward to a new and cleaner version from @alrojo soon!
